mapper.sql: id, name, employmentDate, separationDate, regularDate, department, position, birthday, graduateSchool, education, major, address, identity, mobile, ontractStartDate, ontractEndDate,salary,gender
mapper.select:
select
from employeeinfo where 1=1
and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
and department like concat(concat('%',#{department}),'%')
and position like concat(concat('%',#{position}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into employeeinfo (id, name, employmentDate, separationDate, regularDate, department, position, birthday, graduateSchool, education, major, address, identity, mobile, ontractStartDate, ontractEndDate,salary,gender) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employmentdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{separationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{regulardate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{graduateschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ontractstartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ontractenddate,jdbcType=DATE},#{salary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER})
